name: Meganoble 2
description:
Following the events of Meganoble, one third of the angels in the sky begin to fall from the sky after the betrayal of a powerful rebel. You are tasked with hunting down the falling stars in order to retrieve heavenly valuables that belong only in the right hands and that if left in the wrong hands would cause a downfall of chaos. Choose between two playable characters to take on challenging missions to maintain piece and order in the heavens!

Characters:

Destroyer: Double Jump.

Tina: Learns powers from enemies.

https://thenerdmansion.itch.io/meganoble-2
